name: lambda-env-vars
description: Simple package for decrypting and storing lambda environment variables

scripts.test: npm run-script lint && nyc ava test && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | coveralls
scripts.build: babel src -d build && cp package.json build/package.json && cp README.md build/README.md
scripts.deploy: npm run-script build && cd build && npm publish

author: Aaron Williams <a@aceew.me>
